body_html: @hughsando, in spirit that is the idea we would like to pursue. However, it is more difficult than that in that we use Eigen for a lot of the implementations of kernels. Eigen would have to be compiled multiple ways without causing any symbol conflicts int the final binary, and also we would probably have to break up modules into more dsos so as not to have too large of a binary resident.

body: @hughsando, in spirit that is the idea we would like to pursue. However, it is more difficult than that in that we use Eigen for a lot of the implementations of kernels. Eigen would have to be compiled multiple ways without causing any symbol conflicts int the final binary, and also we would probably have to break up modules into more dsos so as not to have too large of a binary resident.
